WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
When i create a new phpexcel object using PHPExcel_Factory::createReader("Excel2003XML"), then i try to change some cell value, using $cell->setvalue("value"), But finally i need to save the file that i have changed. So do i need to create a Writer to save the file? 
 
I tried: $objWriter = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($objPHPExcel,"excel2003xml"); $objWriter->save('test.xml');
 
But it said that " Fatal error: Class 'PHPExcel_Writer_excel2003xml' not found in... " 
 
Could you help me with how to save the changed file into excel2003xml format?
 
Thank you very much!
 
Cindy

Comments.Message:
Currently you can only read Excel 2003 XML, not write to it.

You can write to XLSX, XLS, CSV, HTML, and PDF: http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Features
